item.title: Currency conversion rates master data service
item.description: A Currency conversion master data service looks like a good candidate for learning about a cloud native implementation for azure functions. This is a master data service, providing base rates for financial systems in an enterprise like accounting, valuations. It does NOT cover trading activities in the area of Asset Management or any other type of high frequency financial service. The following characteristics speak for a serverless implementation: Update frequency once a day Data being served from a database Read only workload Read only but once type of workload The goals of this project are outlined in the following
